text:
Hello! Continuant is hiring an *Inbound Marketing Manager* specializing in HubSpot.
About the marketing team: Our Marketing team manages the Continuant brand and continuously works to further establish the company as a thought leader in the industry. We work closely with our Sales and Product teams to identify what our customers want to achieve, what challenges they face, and how our products help solve these challenges. We then develop the messaging and (online) content that generates leads and empowers our Sales teams to help more customers. Click here if you're interested: <https://www.paycomonline.net/v4/ats/web.php/jobs/ViewJobDetails?job=41287&clientkey=0C97B30784EA1AB32AD33F0D30FA875E>
